verdict: Dominance tier secured – the orchestration mesh operates at unstoppable sovereign capacity.
narrative: Composite index 93.77% fuses owner coverage, custody, validator certainty, automation, and economic velocity. Cross-check variance 0.84% confirms triple-verification integrity.
methodology: Weighted composite prioritises command custody and validator confidence.
Geometric and harmonic guardrails actively hunt for hidden weak links.
Economic velocity injects ROI and throughput to prove macro-scale value creation.

components.label: Owner command coverage
components.description: Portion of economic surfaces with deterministic multi-sig commands.

components.label: Sovereign control score
components.description: Share of deployed modules anchored under owner custody.

components.label: Validator confidence
components.description: Commit–reveal quorum strength across validation committees.

components.label: Automation score
components.description: Autonomous orchestration coverage across the execution mesh.

components.label: Stability index
components.description: Composite resilience gauge blending risk mitigations and buffers.

components.label: Assertion pass rate
components.description: Share of verification assertions exceeding unstoppable thresholds.

components.label: Economic velocity
components.description: Throughput and ROI converted into a 0–1 sovereignty readiness scale.

crossChecks.label: Weighted mean
crossChecks.methodology: Primary weighted composite emphasising owner custody and validator strength.
crossChecks.notes: Governing score used for escalation and launch readiness decisions.

crossChecks.label: Arithmetic baseline
crossChecks.notes: Confirms no component skews the composite through weighting bias.

crossChecks.label: Geometric guardrail
crossChecks.notes: Ensures no hidden surface drops below unstoppable tolerance.

crossChecks.label: Harmonic fail-safe
crossChecks.notes: Triggers reinforcements if a single component drifts downward.

integrity.details: All dominance components exceed the 75% sovereignty guardrail.
